```{r}
pollutantmean("specdata", "sulfate", 1:10)
#[1] 4.064128

pollutantmean("specdata", "nitrate", 70:72)
#[1] 1.706047

pollutantmean("specdata", "sulfate", 34)
#[1] 1.477143

pollutantmean("specdata", "nitrate")
#[1] 1.702932

cc <- complete("specdata", c(6, 10, 20, 34, 100, 200, 310))
print(cc$nobs)
#[1] 228 148 124 165 104 460 232

cc <- complete("specdata", 54)
print(cc$nobs)
#[1] 219


RNGversion("3.5.1")  
set.seed(42)
cc <- complete("specdata", 332:1)
use <- sample(332, 10)
print(cc[use, "nobs"])
#[1] 711 135  74 445 178  73  49   0 687 237

cr <- corr("specdata")                
cr <- sort(cr)   
RNGversion("3.5.1")
set.seed(868)                
out <- round(cr[sample(length(cr), 5, replace = TRUE)], 4)
print(out)
#[1]  0.2688  0.1136 -0.0054  0.4667  0.0462

cr <- corr("specdata", 129)                
cr <- sort(cr)                
n <- length(cr)    
RNGversion("3.5.1")
set.seed(197)                
out <- c(n, round(cr[sample(n, 5)], 4))
print(out)
#[1] 486.0000   0.2540   0.0504  -0.1462  -0.1680   0.6143

cr <- corr("specdata", 2000)                
n <- length(cr)                
cr <- corr("specdata", 1000)                
cr <- sort(cr)
print(c(n, round(cr, 4)))
#[1]  0.0000 -0.0190 -0.0190  0.0419  0.0419  0.1901  0.1901

cr <- corr("specdata", 150)
head(cr)
#[1] -0.01895754 -0.01895754 -0.14051254 -0.14051254 -0.04389737 -0.04389737
```
